Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled “Explore your accessibility options”.

 1. Staff Directory

# Jennifer Kretovic

   [Ward Councilors](https://www.concordnh.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=11) 

Title: Ward Three City Councilor

Phone:603-228-8395

 [JKretovic@concordnh.gov](mailto:JKretovic@concordnh.gov)  

###  Contact 

Residents wishing to contact Councilor Kretovic to discuss issues concerning Ward Three or other city-related matters may call her at 603-228-8395, write to her at 8 Gallen Drive, Concord, NH 03303 or email her.

###  Committee Assignments 

 * Ad Hoc Beaver Meadow Building Committee
 * DEIJB Committee
 * Fiscal Policy Advisory Committee
 * Golf Course Advisory Committee
 * Heritage Commission
 * Manager’s Review Committee (Chair)
 * Public Safety Board
 * Rules Committee (Chair)
